title: Looking for Gold 5+ Players for Tournament! (MUST HAVE MIC)
body:
Currently have positions filled:
All Spots Possibly Filled.


ADC (Taken)
Support (Maybe) Need Sub
Mid (Taken)
Top (Needed)
JG (Taken)

Msg Below, Please have TS If you're willing to play. Communication is needed! Shot Caller would be great too!

Edit: Tournament is 16th Of April Saturday 11am (Come earlier than 11am)

replies.body: If you still need a Support Add me (Lleyt)
Add me Spicy Llama im keen
Ill play, add me SIN Glyph. Ex SIN member. I'm a great shot caller. I main jungle then mid, but top I can deal with. I have everything needed, just let me know.
